website_summaries.verdict: One of Aquaman’s best aspects is his iconic trident, and this toy goes the extra mile by glowing blue, saying his cool catchphrases, and being smaller/easy to handle.
pros: Trident lights up and emits sounds
Great for Justice League pretend time
cons: A bit pricy for a weapon-toy

customer_reviews.title: AquaAwesome!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is surprisingly sturdy. It’s outlasted the abuse from a 4 and 9 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Emommy07

customer_reviews.title: Great price, sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE their new tridents! There were cheaper options but they looked flimsy so I settled on purchasing these. They are sturdy and have already withheld several "sword fights" between my twins. The color is vibrant and it's just a neat toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my nephew, he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this trident for my great nephew's birthday, he is a super hero fan. He loved it! The trident lights up and says lines from the movie. The sword comes out of the trident just like it did in the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The quality is poor, and the design of how you strap the pieces to your body is uncomfortable and flimsy for a child. I wouldve returned it and asked for a full refund, but my son begged to keep it even though he only wore it for 20 minutes and then said it was too uncomfortable to keep on.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne S.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my grandson, he was over the moon. So I assume all is well :)
customer_reviews.author: NYB

customer_reviews.title: Triton for my 8 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this for Christmas. He played with it and even slept with for two days. He loves it. I thought it was smaller than the picture but was as still great for my 8 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Tambra Miliman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy all around
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this, especially the lights and sounds. He also likes that it comes apart to create a separate dagger. He is very rough on toys but this one is holding up just fine. It’s heavy plastic, so it’s pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was hesitant at first but I’m glad I went with my gut and purchased this for my 3 year old. He loved it! Some of the reviews said that the wrist band/armor kept popping off. This hasn’t happened so far - and my son is super active and rough! I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these for all my kids. Great quality. My 2 year old hasn’t broken it which says a lot. He’s pro at breaking his big siblings toys
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it. It was raining and he told his mom that he could not cover up his Aquaman fins!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for an aquaman fan!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this. It isn’t loud enough without being obnoxiously. The light up trident is very cool. A must have for any aquaman fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My son love this it lights up as it should and makes noise. This came in just a few days very happy
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: Son’s favorite toy of Christmas. If your kid is an Aquaman fan I highly recommend. Cool toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son and he loves it. It’s well built and has held up to a lot of play.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Great kid gift
customer_reviews.text: My 3yro LOVES AQUAMAN AND LOVES THIS!! Uses it a lot and it’s pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: TBEAR91

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my son for his aqua man costume. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: Kids have fun with this one...only bad part is fighting over who gets it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a white elephant gift. It was quite popular and the most “stolen” gift. The sound effects were great.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Does it fit?
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this for my 6 year old grandson, hes a thin boy. The body piece was adjustable , but the arm band keep popping off . They just weren't staying together. I wouldn't recommend it for anyone . It was nice and all but not something the child can actually keep on while playing. It was frustrating for the both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Ernestine Flores

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Son loves it. Didn't know it lit up. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves the outfit. He plans to be Aquaman for Halloween so we ordered early to ensure we could find one.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Both of my boys love this. I wouldn't recommend this for very little ones, only because it IS sharp; even though it's plastic. Overall I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my 7 year old nephew. He LOVED it! It was the first gift he wanted to take out of the box to play with and didn’t put it down for hours. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. Only wish it was a bit longer!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Tavarez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his 12th birthday. He loves it. Has not put it down. Made with good quality and durable. Been a huge hit here.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great. It lights up and make noise.
customer_reviews.author: BGood

customer_reviews.title: My 6 yr old loves this! Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! Lights up and makes sounds! Pretty cool! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Birthday party hit
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for 8 year old boy. Party guests wanted to check it out, too.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Lil man loves this toy. Awesome purchase. Now need to buy the outfit
customer_reviews.author: Brandye

customer_reviews.title: Must have !
customer_reviews.text: love love love this trident ! My 5 and 3 year old both have one and its a great size for them both.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my 4-year old cousin and he absolutely loved it. It is adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: R. Valle

customer_reviews.title: My son is in Love
customer_reviews.text: My son Loved it and has been hitting it on Everything literally and it still works and hasn’t broke worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Latoya A Bonton

customer_reviews.title: Well built, good product for the pricemy son lives it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy!! Not annoying loud perfect for little kids. Keeps him enertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: My yr old loved the sounds and the 2 for one toy weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Tdspeigh

customer_reviews.text: Could have been a little bigger but my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Didn't withstand play
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for about 2 hours after opening Christmas Day
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lillard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome my god son loves it and he’s 4
customer_reviews.author: Fendi P.

product_meta.title: AQUAMAN Deluxe Trident
product_meta.description: Style:Aquaman Lights and Sounds TridentBattle like Aquaman with this deluxe Trident featuring lights and sounds! In the movie, epic warfare rages on land and in the visually breathtaking underwater world of the seven seas. Now you can recreate those thrilling adventures with this realistic toy weapon. Use it and become the Super Hero as you run into combat, swing the Trident and see ocean blue lights on the triple point spear power on. Hear true-to-movie sound effects and authentic character phrases like "I bring the power of Atlantis!" When you get close to your enemies draw the concealed blade hidden in the trident and overpower the Super-Villain with a surprising offensive play! Aquaman fights and overcomes his evil brother Orm and the vengeful pirate Black Manta with the power of his Trident! Complete your Aquaman battle gear set with other items including his signature armored chestpiece, gauntlets and plasma blaster! Roar into battle and claim the throne of Atlantis! Each role-play item sold separately, subject to availability.
feature_bullets: Become Aquaman with his iconic trident!
​Wield and wave the spear to activate lights and sounds!
Trident also emits actual movie lines!
Double-sided spear contains a hidden sword.
Gear up even more with Aquaman's armor and blaster! Sold separately, subject to availability.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars280 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
